title: Functional Situationalism-Based Language Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational teaching methodologies and experience in instructional design
context.additional_context: Strengthening situational language learning activity design capabilities in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Over 80% of participants can utilize a framework analyzing language learning contexts from a functional situational perspective
Learners can design at least three types of microlearning language activities by applying behavioral analysis techniques
Learners can improve educational design proposals at least twice based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
